Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150 by many of our customers. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. For you, I am offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $125. This is an opportunity to get a top-notch product at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $125. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $125
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
